paper_abstract: As an important research direction in KDD field, outlier detection has been drawing much attention from different communities. in this paper, two novel algorithms LDBOD and LDBOD+ for outlier detection are proposed. Similar to LOF, they also aim to find local outliers. However, LDBOD/LDBOD+ detects local outliers from the viewpoint of local distribution, which is characterized through three proposed measurements, local-average-distance, local-density, and local-asymmetry-degree. Several experiments were conducted to demonstrate the advantages of LDBOD/LDBOD+ compared with LOF. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: LDBOD: A novel local distribution based outlier detector
